Verses: 1 karththaraale Eremiyaavukku Undaana Vasanam
2 neengal Kettu Yoodhaavin Manusharukkum Erusalemin Kudigalukkum Sollavendiya Udanpadikkaiyin Vaarththaigalaavana:
3 en Saththaththaik Kettu, Naan Ungalukkuk Karpikkirapadiye Ellaak Kaariyangalaiyum Seyyungal; Appozhudhu Neengal En Janamaayiruppeergal, Naan Ungal Dhevanaayiruppen;

4 naan Ungal Pidhaakkalai Iruppukkaalavaayaagiya Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Purappadappannina Naalile Avargalukkuk Karpiththa Indha Udanpadikkaiyin Vaarththaigalaik Kelaadha Manushan Sabikkappattavanendru, Isravelin Raajaavaagiya Karththar Uraikkiraar Endru Avargalukku Sollu.

5 indraiyadhinam Irukkirapadi, Paalum Thenum Odugira Dhesaththai Ungal Pidhaakkalukkuk Koduppenendru Naan Avargalukku Itta Aanaiyai Naan Thidappaduththumpadi Ippadi Aagum Endraar; Adharku Naan Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Appadiye Aagakkadavadhu Karththaave Endren.

6 appozhudhu Karththar Ennai Nokki: Nee Yoodhaavin Pattanangalilum Erusalemin Veedhigalilum Indha Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Koori: Indha Udanpadikkaiyin Vaarththaigalai Neengal Kettu, Avaigalinpadiye Seyyungal.

7 naan Ungal Pidhaakkalai Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Varappannina Naalmudhal, Innaalmattum Naan Avargalukkuth Thidachchaatchiyaai En Saththaththaik Kelungalendru Erkanave Saatchi Vilangaththakkavidhamaai Echchariththuvandhen.

8 aanaalum Avargal Kelaamalum, Thangal Seviyai Saayaamalum Poi, Avaravar Thamtham Pollaadha Irudhayakadinaththinpadi Nadandhaargal; Aadhalaal Naan Avargal Seyyumpadi Kattalaiyittadhum, Avargal Seyyaamarponadhumaana Indha Udanpadikkaiyin Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Avargalukkup Palikkappannuven Endru Sol Endraar.
9 pinnaiyum Karththar Ennai Nokki: Yoodhaavin Manusharukkullum Erusalemin Kudigalukkullum Oru Kattuppaadu Kaanappadugiradhu.

10 avargal En Vaarththaigalaik Ketkamaattomendru Anniya Dhevargalai Sevikka Avaigalaip Pinpatri, Thangaludaiya Munnorgalin Akkiramangalukkuth Thirumbinaargal; Naan Thangal Pidhaakkalode Pannina Udanpadikkaiyai Isravel Kudumbaththaarum Yoodhaa Kudumbaththaarum Meerippottaargal.
11 aagaiyinaal Idho, Avargal Thappiththukkollamaattaadha Theengai Avargalmel Varappannuven; Appozhudhu Ennai Nokkik Kooppiduvaargal; Naan Avargalaik Kelaadhiruppen Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

12 appozhudhu Yoodhaa Pattanangalin Manusharum, Erusalemin Kudigalum Poith Thaangal Thoobankaattiyirundha Dhevargalai Nokkik Kooppittum, Avaigal Avargaludaiya Aabaththukkaalaththil Avargalai Ratchippadhillai.

13 yoodhaave, Un Pattanangalin Lakkamum Un Dhevargalin Lakkamum Sari; Erusalemudaiya Veedhigalin Lakkamum, Neengal Paagaalukkuth Thoobankaattumpadi Andha Lachchaiyaana Kaariyaththukku Sthaabiththa Peedangalin Lakkamum Sari.

14 aadhalaal Nee Indha Janaththukkaaga Vinnappampannavendaam, Avargalukkaaga Mandraadavum Kenjavumvendaam; Avargal Thangal Aabaththinimiththam Ennai Nokkik Kooppidunkaalaththile Naan Avargalaik Kelaadhiruppen.

15 thurchchanarodu Magaa Theevinaiseyyumpodhu, En Piriyamaanavalukku En Veettil Enna Irukkiradhu? Parisuththa Maamsaththai Unnaivittuth Thaandippogappannuvaargal; Un Pollaappu Nadakkumpodhu Nee Kalikoorugiraaye.

16 nalla Kani Undaayirukkira Nerththiyum Pachchaiyumaana Olivamaramennum Peraik Karththar Unakku Ittaar; Aanaal Magaa Amaliyin Saththamaai Adhai Sutrilum Neruppaikkoluththugiraar, Adhin Kombugal Murikkappattadhu.

17 paagaalukkuth Thoobankaattugiradhinaale Enakkuk Kobamundaakka Isravel Kudumbaththaarum, Yoodhaa Kudumbaththaarum Thangalukkuk Kedaaga Seydha Pollaappinimiththam Unmel Theengai Varappannuven Endru Unnai Naattina Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.
18 adhaik Karththar Enakku Ariviththadhinaale Arindhukonden; Avargaludaiya Seygaigalai Appozhudhu Enakkuththeriyakkaattineer.

19 maraththai Adhin Kanigalodunkooda Azhiththuppoduvomendrum, Avan Jeevanullorudaiya Dhesaththiliraamalum, Avan Per Ini Ninaikkappadaamalumpoga Avanai Sangarippomendrum, Enakku Virodhamaai Aalosanaipanninaargal Enbadhai Ariyaadhirundhu, Naan Adikkappaduvadharkuk Kondupogappadum Saadhuvaana Aattukkuttiyaippola Irundhen.

20 senaigalin Karththaave, Ullindhiriyangalaiyum Irudhayaththaiyum Sodhiththarigira Needhiyulla Nyaayaadhipadhiye, Neer Avargalukku Needhiyai Sarikkattugiradhaip Paarppenaaga; En Vazhakkai Umakku Velippaduththivitten Endren.

21 aadhalaal Nee Engal Kaiyinaale Saagaadhapadikkuk Karththarudaiya Naamaththinaale Theerkkadharisanam Sollavendaam Endru Solli, Un Praananai Vaangaththedugira Aanadhoththin Manusharaikkuriththuk Karththar Sollugiraar:
22 idho, Idhinimiththam Ungalai Visaarippen; Ilavayadhullavargal Pattayaththaale Saavaargal; Avargal Kumaararum Avargal Kumaaraththigalum Panjaththaale Saavaargal.
23 avargalil Meedhiyaai Iruppavargalillai; Naan Aanadhoththin Manusharai Visaarikkum Varushaththile Avargalmel Aabaththai Varappannuvenendru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.
